holidays.title: National Limerick Day
holidays.description: We pay homage to the man who made the short poems widespread — Edward Lear.

holidays.title: Child Care Provider Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate the importance of Child Care Providers on this day!

holidays.title: Fintastic Friday
holidays.description: It’s Fintastic Friday, and we want you to partake in some fintastic awareness drives.

holidays.title: International Awareness Day for Chronic Immunological and Neurological Diseases
holidays.description: Join the movement to raise awareness about Chronic Immunological and Neurological Diseases.

holidays.title: International Chronic Fatigue Syndrome Awareness Day
holidays.description: Stand in solidarity and show your support for people battling Myalgic Encephalomyelitis/Chronic Fatigue Syndrome.

holidays.title: International Day of Plant Health
holidays.description: Keeping our plants healthy is crucial to keeping ourselves healthy. Learn more!

holidays.title: International Myalgic Encephalomyelitis Awareness Day
holidays.description: This mysterious disease is a global concern —  we need to get to the bottom of it.

holidays.title: International Nurses Day
holidays.description: We thank the nurses whose support and care has healed people and saved lives.

holidays.title: National Anthony Day
holidays.description: This National Anthony Day, learn more about America’s 49th most common name.

holidays.title: National Fibromyalgia Awareness Day
holidays.description: People suffering from fibromyalgia either go undiagnosed for years or are misdiagnosed.

holidays.title: National Hospital Day
holidays.description: Learn all about the history of National Hospital Day and important reasons to prioritize your health.

holidays.title: National Mental Health Provider Appreciation Day
holidays.description: A note of thanks to all mental health providers who help us lead a better life.

holidays.title: National Military Spouse Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Discover what the government is doing to help struggling servicemen and women’s spouses?

holidays.title: National Nutty Fudge Day
holidays.description: Grab a plate and your mixing bowls; it’s time to celebrate National Nutty Fudge Day.

holidays.title: National Odometer Day
holidays.description: Let’s d(r)ive into the world of odometers and their importance for our vehicles.

holidays.title: National Provider Appreciation Day
holidays.description: The day focuses on thanking childcare workers, and showcasing their contributions to their communities.

holidays.title: National Tampon Day
holidays.description: We’re about to break the silence and dispel some of the most common menstrual myths.

holidays.title: National YA DIG Day
holidays.description: Be yourself and acknowledge your growth because you’re destined for greatness this National YA DIG Day!

holidays.title: Public Gardens Day
holidays.description: To the park! Because doggies are not the only ones excited about the walkies today.

holidays.title: Shades Day
holidays.description: It’s time to slide on some sunshades and lend a helping hand to families in need.

holidays.title: DraconiteDragon’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young Canadian gamer has reached over one million YouTube subscribers and isn’t stopping.

holidays.title: Drumsy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fun and authentic gamer has won the hearts of millions of fans.

holidays.title: George Carlin’s Birthday
holidays.description: The iconic stand-up performer who opened the doors to a new style in comedy.

holidays.title: Tony Hawk’s Birthday
holidays.description: World's most influential skateboarder and huge philanthropist; the legend himself, Tony Hawk.

holidays.title: Vinny Vinesauce’s Birthday
holidays.description: YouTuber, streamer, Twitch star, and a rock superstar — Vinny Vinesauce does it all.
